short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to view two webpages at the same time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dual Webpage Viewer is a simple and easy-to-use extension for opera. With Dual Webpage Viewer, you can view two pages in the same tab. Simply type in your URL in http format, and click "Submit". The pop-up will extend to allow you to view two web pages at once.
